data.title: Tun Rahah Mohamed Noah, the wife to Malaysia‚Äôs second prime minister, Tun Abdul Razak Hussein, passed away today at Prince Court Medical...
data.meta_description:
215 likes, 5 comments - themalaymail on December 18, 2020: "Tun Rahah Mohamed Noah, the wife to Malaysia‚Äôs second prime minister, Tun Abdul Razak Hussein, passed away today at Prince Court Medical Centre here of old age.

Her death at the age of 87 was confirmed by her son, the country's sixth prime minister Datuk Seri Najib Razak.

‚ÄúMy mother is gone. My family and I are in the hospital. Sadness and tears flowed. There are no words to describe this loss,‚Äù he posted on his social media accounts.

Rahah, 87, married Abduk Razak on September 4, 1952 and the couple had five sons, Najib, Mohamed Nazir, Datuk Ahmad Johari, Datuk Mohamed Nizam and Datuk Mohamed Nazim.

(üì∏: Via Facebook)
#tunrahah #najibrazak #tunabdulrazak #malaysia".
